968530.name: Decks of Dexterity
968530.description:
Decks of Dexterity fuses bullet hell shooter gameplay with a strategic turn based card game; your deck determines your power! Explore the Void to discover hundreds of cards, powerful treasures, unique characters, all contributes to building a powerful deck and defeating the corruption!

Features

  • Hybrid Bullet Hell + Turn Based Gameplay: These two gameplay systems seem like polar opposites but fuse together to provide a fast paced but strategic gameplay loop that will have you jumping between dodging bullets to carefully planning your next turn every fight.

  • Powerful Cards and Treasures: With over 700 cards to collect you have the ability utilize Guns, Swords, harness magical powers, and even control time and space to defeat enemies. As you play you will progressively unlock new cards and eventually gain the ability to develop your own!

  • Open World Maps: Instead of being locked to a single path each section of the Void allows you to move freely and discover all of its secrets. Discover loot chests, trade your cards at Exchanges, negotiate for better deals, embark on Quests, and encounter whacky characters in events.

  • Story Campaign: Alongside randomized runs, you can discover the source of the corruption in the story campaigns. Unlock new modes and further your deck building power continuously!

Future Updates

  • Modding Support - Decks of Dexterity has powerful modding features that support creating modded cards, treasures, classes, enemies, gameplay modifiers, and campaigns.

  • Leaderboards - Compete with other deck builders in speed run, endurance, and skill competitions.

  • Envoker Class - Wield the power of the elements!

Credits

Decks of Dexterity contains awesome music by awesome creators! Artists include Punch Deck, JDB Artist, Kevin MacLeod, and GameDevYal alongside original music! Non-original music is licensed under Creative Commons by Attribution (4.0).
